about_the_game:
The year is 2054. Kharkiv is growing, building, and restoring the places of worship of the past. You are Yaroslav Varenyk, a student at one of the city's universities. Your parents bought you an apartment in Pavlovo Pole, and your task is to make it comfortable! To do this, you will have to go to the market to buy different things and bargain!

This market is one of the largest in the world, and the largest in Eastern Europe! It is popularly nicknamed “The Drum”. In the future, this will be its official name! So join us for an interesting exploration of the “Drum” of the future!

One of the best neighborhoods in the city

You live in one of the best neighborhoods in the city - Pavlove Pole! It has a good infrastructure, and you can even take a walk to see all its beauties! It is actively under construction, so there is a good subway system! In addition, a market is also being built here, but it is not yet operational.

Every game day you will need to get to the Drum. You live in the Pavlovo Pole neighborhood, from which you will have two ways to get to the market:

It can be the subway:

It can be a bus:

Once you arrive at the market, you will face a number of tasks. One of them is to find the right store, which is what you will do. You'll have a list of must-haves, and all of them are sold in different stores! You need to find each one, and that's what you'll do!

Once you find the item you want, you can buy it at the price you are offered. But you may often have a limited budget, so in some cases you will be forced to bargain with the sellers in the market! And these cases are the majority! Therefore, your main task is to bargain when buying different kinds of goods! This is the main task of this game - to learn to bargain!

As a result, in the game you are waiting for:

-Your personal apartment where your purchases will appear;

-The ability to buy more than 15 products on the market;

-The ability and need to bargain;

-A comedy storyline;

-Computer graphics;

You will get to the market every day, where you will improve your bargaining skills with sellers. You can also buy yourself a light snack! Remember that the way to save money is through cunning and the ability to get out of a situation. We are waiting for you at the market!

  • Processor: I3 2xxx or AMD A8
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 620m or analog AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DX11
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: None

  • OS: Windows 11

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 or analog AMD
